question: I'm 50 years old, type 2 diabetes, i'm in the pre menopausal stage.  i'm planning to get married next year and the last thing i need to worry about is getting pregnant.  I have a 27 year old.  i'm leaning towards having a tubal ligation, going to see my gyn dr. next week.  is it common for women at my have this procedure?
title: Tubal Ligation
